about_the_game:
Off Trail is a procedurally generated infinite downhill skiing game. Land tricks, discover unique biomes, and ski alongside countless creatures.

  • Procedural generation - Explore an infinite downhill mountain with new terrain in every run

  • Unique biomes - Explore unique biomes, from the Andes to the Japanese Alps

  • Hazards - Ski as far as you can on each run, while avoiding trees and animals

  • XP system - Earn XP on each run, allowing you to unlock items and venture further down the mountain

  • Day-night cycle - Ski through days and nights, taking in the beauty of the sunset and sunrise

  • Weather - Survive the toughest blizzards and ski through rainy thunderstorms

  • Dog companion - Feeling lonely on the vast mountain? A dog companion accompanies you on your journey, helping to scare away dangerous predators
